description: Led the migration of database monitoring to the cloud, reducing costs and completing OPENLANE’s cloud transition. Established Infrastructure as Code practices, creating consistent and scalable infrastructure across projects. Optimized CI/CD processes, improving deployment speed and reliability. Enhanced monitoring and incident response times, and coordinated production releases for seamless feature deployment

Developed and maintained high-quality, customizable landing pages for rapid deployment, enhancing flexibility and user engagement. Contributed to the team effort in rebuilding Intelitics’ flagship software with modern technologies, focusing on feature modernization and improved scalability. Led the initiative to codify the cloud infrastructure, automating resource creation with Terraform to streamline operations and support scalability
